actions.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 211 (Roll no. 215).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Huizenga (MI).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 211 (Roll no. 215).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

description: Amendment sought to strike section 212 from the bill. Section 212 prohibits the use of funds to plan for, begin, continue, finish, process, or approve a public-private competition under an OMB Circular A-76 or any successor administrative regulation, directive, or policy for work performed by employees of the Bureau of Prisons or of Federal Prison Industries, Incorporated.
purpose: An amendment to reinstate the Circular A-76 for work performed by employees of the Bureau of Prisons or Federal Prison Industries, Incorporated.
